description.zh-cn: 中国大陆著名喜剧演员、影视演员，以小品和东北二人转著称。曾任本山传媒董事长，并与辽宁大学合作创办本山艺术学院。因与薄熙来、王立军等政界人物关系密切而卷入政治风波。
description.en: A famous Chinese comedian and film/television actor, known for his sketches and Northeast China's Errenzhuan. He served as the chairman of Benshan Media and co-founded the Benshan School of Art with Liaoning University. He became embroiled in political controversy due to his close relationships with political figures like Bo Xilai and Wang Lijun.

description.zh-cn: 指原重庆市副市长王立军进入美国驻成都总领事馆滞留事件，该事件引发了中共高层动荡，并间接导致赵本山与薄熙来等人的关系被曝光。
description.en: Refers to the incident where former Chongqing vice-mayor Wang Lijun entered the US consulate in Chengdu, which triggered turmoil within the CCP's top leadership and indirectly led to the exposure of Zhao Benshan's relationship with Bo Xilai and others.

description.en: Former Chinese politician, former member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee and Party Secretary of Chongqing. He is rumored to have close financial ties with Zhao Benshan.

en: State Administration of Press, Publication, Radio, Film and Television

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院负责监督管理新闻、出版、广播、电影和电视等事业的直属机构。曾以“题材丑化农民群众”为由叫停赵本山的新剧《爹妈满院》。
description.en: A direct subordinate agency of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for supervising press, publication, radio, film, and television. It halted the broadcast of Zhao Benshan's new drama 'Parents Courtyard' on the grounds that it 'uglified the peasant masses'.

description.zh-cn: 赵本山主演的电视剧，原定于2014年在浙江卫视播出，但在开播前被广电总局叫停。
description.en: A TV series starring Zhao Benshan, originally scheduled to air on Zhejiang Satellite TV in 2014, but was halted by the State Administration of Press, Publication, Radio, Film and Television before its premiere.

description.zh-cn: 2014年由中共中央总书记习近平主持召开的会议。赵本山的缺席被外界解读为政治失势的信号。
description.en: A meeting chaired by CCP General Secretary Xi Jinping in 2014. Zhao Benshan's absence was interpreted by outsiders as a signal of his political downfall.

description.en: It is rumored that Zhao Benshan had significant financial ties with Bo Xilai and was designated as the 'Minister of Culture' in the failed coup plot by Bo Xilai and Zhou Yongkang.

description.zh-cn: 赵本山未被邀请参加此次由中共中央总书记习近平主持的重要会议，被外界广泛解读为他已失势的政治信号。
description.en: Zhao Benshan was not invited to this important meeting chaired by CCP General Secretary Xi Jinping, which was widely interpreted as a political signal of his fall from favor.
